Package com.gmail.aydinov.sergey.simple_debugger_plugin.event.debug_event

package com.gmail.aydinov.sergey.simple_debugger_plugin.event.debug_event
Events generated on the debugger side of the Simple Debugger Plugin.

These events are used to notify components about changes in the debugger's internal state, such as breakpoints, thread suspension, resumption, or other debug activities.

Author: Sergei Aidinov <sergey.aydinov@gmail.com>
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sergei-aidinov/

Since:
1.0
